price: i rekli bi: "Nema života osim na dunjaluku i mi oživljeni biti nećemo."
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
